verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, How long wilt thou \w mourn|strong="H0056"\w* for \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, seeing I have \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* him from \w reigning|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* thine \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* thee to \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* the \w Beth-lehemite|strong="H1022"\w*: for I have \w provided|strong="H7200"\w* me a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* among his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, How can I \w go|strong="H3212"\w*? if \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \add it\add*, he will \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* me. And the

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* that which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*. And the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of the \w town|strong="H5892"\w* \w trembled|strong="H2729"\w* at his \w coming|strong="H7125"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Comest|strong="H0935"\w* thou \w peaceably|strong="H7965"\w*?\f + \fr 16.4 \ft coming: Heb. meeting\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Peaceably|strong="H7965"\w*: I am \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* yourselves, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* with me to the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*. And he \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* them to the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass, when they were \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, that he \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* on \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Surely the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* \add is\add* before him.\f + \fr 16.6 \ft Eliab: called Elihu\f*

But the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, \w Look|strong="H5027"\w* not on his \w countenance|strong="H4758"\w*, or on the \w height|strong="H1364"\w* of his \w stature|strong="H6967"\w*; because I have \w refused|strong="H3988"\w* him: for \add the \+nd Lord\+nd* seeth\add* not as \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w*; for \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w looketh|strong="H7200"\w* on the outward \w appearance|strong="H5869"\w*, but the

Then \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Abinadab|strong="H0041"\w*, and made him \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*. Then \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* made \w Shammah|strong="H8048"\w* to pass \w by|strong="H5674"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Neither hath the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* this.\f + \fr 16.9 \ft Shammah: Shimeah, also called, Shimma\f*

Again, \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* made \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* to \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*. And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath not \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* these.

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*, Are here \w all|strong="H8552"\w* \add thy\add* \w children|strong="H5288"\w*? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, There \w remaineth|strong="H7604"\w* yet the \w youngest|strong="H6996"\w*, and, behold, he \w keepeth|strong="H7462"\w* the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*. And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*, \w Send|strong="H7971"\w* and \w fetch|strong="H3947"\w* him: for we will not sit \w down|strong="H5437"\w* till he \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w hither|strong="H6311"\w*.\f + \fr 16.11 \ft down: Heb. round\f*

And he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w*, and brought him \w in|strong="H0935"\w*. Now he \add was\add* \w ruddy|strong="H0132"\w*, \add and\add* \w withal|strong="H5973"\w* of a \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w* \w countenance|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w goodly|strong="H2896"\w* to look \w to|strong="H7210"\w*. And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* him: for this \add is\add* he.\f + \fr 16.12 \ft of a…: Heb. fair of eyes\f*

Then \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* him in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*: and the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w came|strong="H6743"\w* upon \w David|strong="H1732"\w* from that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w forward|strong="H4605"\w*. So \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*.

¶ But the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the

d* \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* from \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and an \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* from the

And \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Behold now, an \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* from \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w troubleth|strong="H1204"\w* thee.

Let our \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* now \w command|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \add which are\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, to seek \w out|strong="H1245"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \add who is\add* a \w cunning|strong="H3045"\w* \w player|strong="H5059"\w* on an \w harp|strong="H3658"\w*: and it shall come to pass, when the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* from \w God|strong="H0430"\w* is upon thee, that he shall \w play|strong="H5059"\w* with his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and thou shalt be \w well|strong="H2895"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w Provide|strong="H7200"\w* me now a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that can \w play|strong="H5059"\w* \w well|strong="H3190"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \add him\add* to me.

Then \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w servants|strong="H5288"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* the \w Beth-lehemite|strong="H1022"\w*, \add that is\add* \w cunning|strong="H3045"\w* in \w playing|strong="H5059"\w*, and a \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* valiant \w man|strong="H2428"\w*, and a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, and \w prudent|strong="H0995"\w* in \w matters|strong="H1697"\w*, and a \w comely|strong="H8389"\w* \w person|strong="H0376"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* with him.\f + \fr 16.18 \ft matters: or, speech\f*

¶ Wherefore \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* unto \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Send|strong="H7971"\w* me \w David|strong="H1732"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, which \add is\add* with the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.

And \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* an \w ass|strong="H2543"\w* \add laden\add* with \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and a \w bottle|strong="H4997"\w* of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, and \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w kid|strong="H1423"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \add them\add* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* unto \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him: and he \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* him \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w*; and he became his \w armourbearer|strong="H5375"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Let \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, I pray thee, \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me; for he hath \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w favour|strong="H2580"\w* in my \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.

And it came to pass, when the \add evil\add* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* from \w God|strong="H0430"\w* was upon \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* an \w harp|strong="H3658"\w*, and \w played|strong="H5059"\w* with his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: so \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* was \w refreshed|strong="H7304"\w*, and was \w well|strong="H2895"\w*, and the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* from him.
